ygData.subject: Re: Bard Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was in the Wind Spirit s Song last night. Merchants cannot be considered, as they poof on death. However, three people were carrying lutes, and one a
ygData.messageBody:
> My take on this is that these two instuments will only be discovered if
> Verant leaks the information.

I was in the Wind Spirit's Song last night.

Merchants cannot be considered, as they poof on death.

However, three people were carrying lutes, and one a flute/drum.

I forget the spelling of the names (silly bard that I am) but
the guildmaster had a lute (L50), Clay had the flute/drum (green),
the female watchperson had a lute (blue), the trainer outside
had a lute too.

I'm probably going to get the more evil half of the guild to
attempt to break-in and rock the bard guild house. See what
turns up. Has anyone done this yet? I know it was suggested
by someone else a while back.

Harmonic.
